author: {'steamid': '76561197962640085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1590560641}
review:
This game feels very much like pokemon, as I'm sure others have probably already pointed out.  In fact, I'd go as far as to say it's impossible not to instantly compae them unless you have never played pokemon before.  The only thing that really sets this game apart is that it's in a 3d environment and set in a sort of folklorish fantasy land full of elves and fairies and goblins.  I happen to be a fan of that genre, so I thought that was pretty cool.

I won't get too much into the story, but the gameplay consists of running through scenic areas, looking for hidden items, bumping into other fairy trainers that want to fight you, and catching new kinds of fairies (in what are basically pokeballs) until you get to the next zone, which futhers the plot and gives you access to new kinds of fairies, which can have skills that also help you get past certain areas.  Again, very very reminiscent of pokemon, so if you love the good old days of red and blue, and want that in a 3d world with a whimsical fantasy feel, this game is definitely for you.  If you are more of a purist and hate ripoffs, stick with pokemon.  Keep in mind, this game was released only 4 or so years after pokemon.

Combat takes you to an arena that I suppose is somewhere in the "fairy realm" or whatever, and takes place between two fairies at any given time.  Each fairy has certain stats that impact their ability to fly around and shoot other fairies, or resist attacks.  There are elemental types of damage so expect some rock/paper/scissors type party building.  A typical battle consists of you flying around the area, finding the other fairy, possibly switching fairies to the right element to match your opponent (which gets annoying, because the enemies will do the exact same thing as soon as you do) and then charging whatever ability you have and firing until it passes out and gets replaced by the next fairy in the opponent's roster.   This is my only main problem with the game.  I feel like they could have done a lot more with the way battles play out, and the skill sets seem limited to mainly just "shoot this beam at that thing."  That having been said, it still feels really good when you take your newly evolved super fairy in against something and it's like flying around with a dragon instead of a butterfly.

I'd recommend purely because the formula works.  It's fun and addictive and the world is vibrant and full of interesting creatures.  It's pokemon with faries, which either sounds amazing or awful depending on the type of person you are I guess.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140918106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1512566984}
review: Самая любимая игра детства . Некоторые говорят , что стимовская версия не  рабочая , но у меня работает так же как и на торенте,а если есть проблемы то достаточно прервести вот это : "Please make sure you are using the latest graphics card driver (especially for NVIDIA cards). You can always find the latest drivers directly at the manufacturers' website. Please do not rely on automatic Windows updates. - Symptom of NVIDIA cards: broken polygon display after starting the first scene. Solution: 1. Open NVIDIA control panel 2. Go to "Manage 3D settings" -> "Program Settings", there, select "Zantph.exe" 3. Set the "Maximum count of pre-rendered single frames" to 1 and... 4. "Apply". The grapic-errors should now be fixed. -Incompatibility with notebooks (FPS drops in the menu): Set your screen resolution to a modus with 32 bit color depth" И всё будет ок. Стимовская версия вполне работает , если у вас руки растут из плеч :) .Так же в обсуждении написано как исправить проблемы с мышкой и в руководствах есть русификатор и ненадо ставить негативных отзывы если игра вам понравилась ,вобщем 10из10

author: {'steamid': '76561198022172146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1440407292}
review:
I have heard so much about how good this game is, first hearing about it on TV Tropes' "Needs More Love" page. The concept certainly seems interesting - a creature-collecting RPG with a first-person shooter combat system. What's not to love?

Lag. On a GTX 760. In 2015. For a game released more than a decade beforehand. That's what.

Yes, in a rather disgraceful move, Daedalic Entertainment saw fit to release this game on Steam with some alleged fixes to the game to make it run on modern OSes, yet I have experienced occasional textures disappearing or flickering, as well as some downright nasty frame rate drops and mouse lag in the menus and dialogue sequences. Given that dialogue is a big part of the game, and the fact that the main menu obviously must be navigated in order to get into the game, this isn't a small issue, especially since the amount of lag tends to vary from menu to menu, and ESPECIALLY-especially given that this lag extends to dialogue windows. And in an RPG, where one would expect quite a bit of dialogue, that really kills my enjoyment of this game.

The patterns I have seen on the forum seem to hint at the fact that Windows 10 seems to be the culprit here, and while I won't immediately jump to the conclusion that this is the cause, I am sincerely worried if it is. Because the fact that the developer makes a song and dance on the store page about updating it to work with modern iterations of Windows, yet conveniently leaves out that certain modern iteration of Windows that's been around for nearly a month at time of writing. Even longer if you count the public testing.

(UPDATE: Having seen one other post, Windows 8 doesn't seem to be exempt from the menu lag either. This worries me immensely, so this has not changed my speculation on the situation.)

It may not be an expensive game, but I would still strongly recommend holding off on purchasing this game until Daedalic has made it abundantly clear that these issues with menu lag have been fixed. I also really hope Daedelic has learned their lesson here - while releasing a game from the last decade for a modern generation of users is a noble cause, if you aren't going to address every modern user and the issues they may come across, then either consider delaying it for fixes, or don't even bother. Absolute disgrace of an updated rerelease, and a stain on what I have heard is an underrated gem of a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063364931', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1668025554}
review:
Heureuse de retrouver ce jeu. Aussitôt vu aussitôt acheté.
Mélange de Quake (combats de fées) et de Pokemon (collectionner les fées), j'ai passé des dixaines d'heures sur ce jeu quand j'avais la version cd.
Les graphismes peuvent semblait vieillot mais les décors étaient magnifique pour l'époque et restent très plaisant à l'oeil.
Une musique d'introduction que j'ai plaisir à écouter en boucle.

Malheureusement une petite (ou est-ce grosse) touche négative est que je me retrouve avec un pointeur de souris qui rame comme pas permis. Il existe une solution (trouvable dans la communeauté du jeu) mais je n'ai pas encore osé l'essayer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985424533', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1607, 'last_played': 1440684507}
review:
ZanZarah is a rare little gem which can best be described as a fantasy adventure fused witn Pokemon and FPS elements. Core of the game is catching, training and evolving Fairies and having them duel with enemy fairies in a quick FPS arena. Fairies can be captured as well to increase your pool.

The graphics are capped at a resolution of 1024x768 but have aged pretty well in my opinion.

I'd say it's well worth the price - can't do wrong at well under 10$.


However, you should note a few things:

-The game is pretty old and was written for Windows XP or even 98/ME. It can have issues on more modern systems (not having any here on Win 8.1 x64, even without compatibility mode, but other ppl have reported massive issues)

-game doesn't like ALT-TAB, resultinmg in a crash - better not use it while playing

-mouse movement is pretty chunky in the configuration menu, so far this is the only menu where it's happening

-if you have any issues, don't count on any patches coming, since the original publisher went bankrupt shortly after release of the game in 2002, an addon, which was already in production was scrapped


If the game works however, you will be able to play a rare gem, especially if you like Pokemon-style games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967751654', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3381, 'last_played': 1501636173}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021298237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1587764438}
review: Zanzarah: The Hidden Portal - одна из самых любимых игр детства теперь в стиме. Я всегда стараюсь покупать старые игры, которые нравились мне в детстве, но разочаровывает оптимизация под новые операционные системы... Нужели трудно было немного поработать над игрой, дабы она запускалась без проблем?! Разработчики выставили старенькую игру с новым ценником, так пусть отрабатывают свои деньги... Игре ставлю 11 баллов из 10, а конкретной стимовской версии 2 балла из 10. Боюсь я не могу никому порекомендовать нерабочий продукт...

author: {'steamid': '76561197972636494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1440324601}
review:
One of my favorite games as a child.

It is comparable with the first Pokemon games in complexity, but the story is far better and you get to fight your battles as FPS in a lot of different arenas.

The game has a multilayer, but I don't know if it is still working -  there you can fight with your trained fairies against others.

One of the most interesting parts of the game is, that there are many strategies to win a fight. For one there are different types that are effective/ineffective against one another. On the other hand you can equip your fairies with different attacks. And different fairies have also different stats (HP, MP, Speed ...).
Depending on your strategy you can beat a FIRE-Fairy with an (ineffective) NATUR-Fairy, because you are fast enough to avoid their attacks while using slow but steadily killing poison attacks :)

Anyway, the game is more than worth its price.

Have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965817175', 'num_games_owned': 2118, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1621748779}
review:
Geniales Spiel. Aufgrund Nostalgie ohne zu zögern gekauft.
Zum aktuellen Zeitpunkt komplett unspielbar! Massivste Grafikfehler, keine Widescreen Auflösungen, kein Fenstermodus, Maus funktioniert nicht. Für fehlende Polygone (Wände, Umgebung, Boden) gibt es zwar einen "fix". Allerdings ist das angeblich aufgepeppelte Zanzarah ein Witz. Ich kann genauso gut meine fast 15 Jahre alte CD Auspacken. Vermutlich haben sich das Spiel bis jetzt nur Fans von Früher gekauft. Gerade diese massivst zu enttäuschen ... ist fragwürdig.

Wieso released Daedalic ein Altes Deutsches Spiel in einer unspielbaren Version. Wurde das Build auch nur einmal getestet oder hat jemand seine CD Version mit Crack auf Steam verteilt? Die CD-Key Box ist noch da, jedoch ausgegraut. Vermutlich ist deshalb auch kein Online Modus möglich. Immerhin handelt es sich um eine bezahlte Raubkopie.

Als Besitzer der CD Version eine richtige Enttäuschung. Da sind mir Steam Release mit eingebauter DOSBox ja lieber...

Enttäuschend Daedalic, sehr enttäuschend!

author: {'steamid': '76561197999150791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1440407170}
review:
Don't get me wrong, great game. I have fond memories of playing this back when it originally came out, and as you can see from the other reviews, its basically fairy themed third person pokemon with first person 'creature' fights.

I played this out back in the day, and would love to play it out again.

I cannot, however, recommend this game.

Why you ask? Because it ran better on my 1998 Compaq Presario, than my current 8 grand worth of hardware. And I doubt it will ever be fixed, owing to the company that made it going out of business in the mid 2000's, and recently being bought out (in name only) by Nordic Games. 

What does this mean for us gamers? Simply that they can release old content (and earn a bit of dough off us sappy sentimental folks) without ever having to commit to fixing the obvious flaws that causes the game to slow to painfully slow fps any time any box of dialog or menu opens over the main screen.

I'm sure a small investment would fix this, and I eagerly await it happening, however I must also resign myself to the fact that it probably won't.

If you want to purchase this out of sentimentality, go right ahead. Otherwise, leave it alone until it's fixed, and don't tarnish your opinion of what is actually quite a great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050421772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1694699191}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042459704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1536682801}
review:
Любимая игра детства, и этим всё сказано. Думаю, у каждого она своя. У меня этой игрой является потрясающая "Занзара".  Локации, персонажи, сами феи - всё это я вспоминаю с огромной любовью. Вязкие болота, непроходимые леса (в которых на тебя постоянно нападают противные феи природы), вдохновляющий воздушный мир, пугающие пещеры. Эти места Занары я знаю наизусть до сих пор, хотя прошло более десяти лет, как я там побывал в последний раз. 
Самое клёвое в "Занзаре" это то, что она понравится абсолютно любому человеку. От маленьких девочек, до взрослых мужиков, угорающих по всякой чернухе, я уверен. Кем бы ты ни был-этот мир увлечёт тебя с головой. Его локации (с кучей секретов) поражают. Его персонажи умиляют. Да и просто-напросто в этой игре есть всё для того, чтобы заинтересовать каждого. Логическая составляющая при выборе фей, увлекательные сражения на разнообразных аренах, бродилка, квесты, подземный мир тёмных эльфов. Всё, что душе угодно, в прекрасной оболочке. И, конечно же, замечательный сюжет, с интригой, предательствами, подставами, драмой. Я не шучу, Развязка впечатляет, а в детстве и вовсе поразила. Отдельный интерес составляет собрание полной коллекции всех этих замечательных фей, среди которых у вас обязательно появятся любимчики. В общем, незабываемый шедевр на века с самой красивой заглавной песней (Kariina Gretere – Come With Me) и идеально подходящей музыкой. Великолепное противостояние света и тьмы, льда и пламени, энергии и металла, хаоса и пси. Противостояние маленькой девочки Эми против всего зла волшебного мира.
Крылатая Весбат, я иду ловить тебя в свой шар.
P.S. Я по гроб жизни обязан продавцу, который посоветовал мне 11 лет назад купить именно Занзару, вместо какого-то там шутерка. Сам бы я, боюсь, не обратил внимания на игру с феями и девчонкой на обложке. Спасибо ему. Надеюсь, у него всё хорошо в жизни :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198063209211', 'num_games_owned': 664, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1505241772}
review: Что  я вижу в стиме ? Неужели игра детства ))) Сыграла впервые наверно лет 10 назад . Игра произвела отличное впечатление (Весь мир Занзары : эльфы, гоблины, феи) которое осталось и на сегодняшний день. Динамичные дуэли между феями неотъемлемая часть геймплея). Спустя столько лет все еще надеюсь на продолжение!  10 пси-фей из 10 !

author: {'steamid': '76561198079492620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1475957810}
review:
Oh wow endlich kann ich es wieder spielen.
Eine super Idee dieses Spiel wieder auferstehen zu lassen.
Die Grafik haut einen jetzt nicht mehr so ganz vom Hocker, aber das Spiel ist glaube gute 10 Jahre alt und dafür kann es sich noch echt sehen lassen.
Es ist im Grunde wie Pokemon nur statt Rundenbasierter Kämpfe hat man die Chance das Ganze in First Person zu erleben. Die Feen haben verschiedene Typen und somit auch Stärken und Schwächen. Dazu kommt dann aber eben auch eine geschickte Taktik auf dem Schlachtfeld, da man nur begrenzt fliegen kann.
Von den neuen Spielen verwöhnt fehlt mir ein Questlog, aber das ist nicht ganz so schlimm.
Auf jeden Fall ist die Story echt süß und die Welt fantasievoll gestaltet.
Meiner Meinung nach ein Muss für jeden der Fantasy, RPG's und Pokemon liebt ;).

author: {'steamid': '76561198035532591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1440361248}
review:
Was soll ich sagen? 
Meine erste Review zu einem Spiel, welches über 10 Jahre alt ist. Ich bin nicht diese Art von Persönlichkeit, die auf Anhieb die passenden Worte findet. Ich war zehn Jahre, als dieses Spiel erschien, habe es abgöttisch geliebt. Ja, meine Schwester und ich mussten wahrhaftig diese nur allzu bekannten eckigen Augen haben, denn so einfach bekam man uns nicht vom PC weg ;) Genau an die Story und dem ganzen drum herum kann ich mich nicht mehr entsinnen, dennoch hatte ich mich entschlossen dieses Spiel zu kaufen. 

Zwar erst einige Minuten gespielt, möchte ich dennoch meine ersten Eindrücke hier hinterlassen. Die Grafik an sich ist... Nun ja, alt eben, aber das stört in keinster Weise, denn sofort taucht man irgendwie ein in das Spiel. Man bekommt einen Begleiter, man kämpft sich durch und möchte immer mehr von der Geschichte hinter Zanzarah aufdecken. Es ist eine Art Bann die mich umgibt (Mit Verlaub habe ich das in den wenigsten Spielen heutzutage) Ich kann euch dieses Spiel nur wärmstens ans Herz legen, auch wenn man es noch nicht kennt. Es zieht einen einfach magisch an.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088013032', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1216, 'last_played': 1469461376}
review:
игра огонь!для тех кто незнает как исправить проблему с текстурами ловите (сорри за гугл перевод)
Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что вы используете последнюю версию драйвера видеокарты (особенно для NVIDIA карт). Вы всегда можете найти самые последние драйверы непосредственно на сайте производителя. Пожалуйста, не полагаться на автоматические обновления Windows.

Симптом NVIDIA карт: сломанной полигон дисплей после запуска первой сцены.

Решение:
Панель управления 1. Откройте NVIDIA
2. Перейдите к "Управление настройки 3D" -> "Настройки программы", там выберите "Zantph.exe"
3. Установите "максимальное количество предварительно оказанные отдельных кадров" 1 и ...
4. Нажмите кнопку "Применить"
Графические ошибки должны быть исправлены.

Пожалуйста, обратите внимание:
Как правило, вы найдете zanthp.exe в установочном пути / папки пара:
..... \ Steam \ SteamApps \ Common \ ZanZarah \ System ..

Несовместимость с ноутбуками (FPS падает в меню):
Установите разрешение экрана вы к модус с 32-битной глубиной цвета.

Надеюсь, что это поможет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025502151', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1441578518}
review:
Für mich einfach ein absoluter Klassiker, habe es glaube ich 3 mal durch und unzählige male angefangen, is leider etwas untergegangen und der 2te teil der wohl geplant war ist nie erschienen, für den Multiplayer war die Zeit denke ich einfach noch nicht reif und zudem stand Funatics nach meinem Wissen zu der Zeit wohl kurz vor der Pleite. Dennoch, habe das Spiel, genauso wie Cultures, in meiner Kindheit geliebt ebenso wie heute und viele Stunden damit verbracht. Man stößt damit vielleicht manchmal auf Missmut weil es um Feen geht, doch es ist darum keineswegs ein "kleine Mädchen" Spiel, es ist teilweise sogar recht düster. Für mich ein wundervolles Spiel das mehr verdient hätte und jetzt hoffentlich etwas mehr davon bekommt. :)

Bei mir läuft es übrigens super.

Bei meiner alten Orginal Version musste ich meine Graka vom Strom trennen (mit onboard spielen) und brauchte ein älteres externes Laufwerk.

I7-2700k
GTS 450
16 GB 1333 MHz CL 9 (lief auch mit 8 GB 1600 MHz CL 9)

author: {'steamid': '76561198052501099', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1629563352}
review:
Без приувеличений одна из лучших игр, которые я прошёл (5 раз)!!! 

Будучи фанатом кровавого месива, фаталити и прочего гора, я полюбил этот девчачий мирок :D всё-таки незватает игр, по-настоящему добрых и героических как эта! Но в одной лишь атмосфере дело, геймплэй завоёвывает, возникает непреодалимое желание to catch 'em all! 

P.S вот так должны были выглядеть покемоны, нинтендо!

10 бормотаний Таданы из 10

Правда русского почему-то нет, да и звуков боя, но я надеюсь по правят, потому что русская озвучка по-лучше сделана.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000665293', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1346, 'last_played': 1517360320}
review:
Old school, comparativly to many other game on the market, and it shows, but was also one of the first games I bought after buying my first computer, so it holds sentimental value to me. I was so sad when my computer died, and my new one wouldn't play the CD-ROM (which I still have).

But that's not why you're reading this.

You play as Amy (or whatever you name her). From what the origional player book implies, she's the a-typical loner heroine. She gets runed away to a mystical land where she must cure the faeries that have been poluted. How do you accomplish this, by capturing the feries with orbs after battling them and recruiting them.

Each faery type had their natural weaknesses, nature/grass are weak to fire, who's weak to water, who's weak to nature.  Some mature faster, while other are better attacker, defenders, or support. Water isn't always powerful, but have heals. Nature can poison and run around while regenerating their health. Stone are tough, but rather slow overall, while fire focuses a lot on offence.

As the faery level, they gain skill slots of attack, defence, or support/passive. They are mostly tuned to a single element, but some morph to be able to hold 2, or any, element type.

The faery in the world with you will be the first in battle, and usually offer some benefit in the world around them, like onlock element locks around the maps, or reveal hidden items.

You buy orbs to capture faery in level ranges. You can also buy/sell skills you don't need.

As you gather more faery, you can return home to see them flying around your flat.

The biggest buggy part is the menus. They tend to be jumpy, while the actual gameplay will be a lot smoother. If it could support FULL HD someday, that would be great.

The story is cute, the puzzles aren't too hard, and for me, is a nice relacing game to play.

As a personal suggestion will be re-adjusting the controls to ASDW from their ARROW presets. For me, it makes travel better, and also makes changing faery in battle quicker.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008378081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1538309937}
review:
Do you like Pokemon, and first person shooters? Well I bet you didn't know there was a game for you!

First off, let me say this is a very biassed review because I owned this game years ago and used to absolutely LOVE it. True the controls aren't the best but there's a lot of love in this game and its really quite charming. I've only played it a little so far but it seems to be a very stable and faithful port that works fine on newer versions of windows.

There's a very large variety of fairies to collect each with their own elements and attributes and each element has its own strengths and weaknesses, which is why its so easy to compare it to pokemon. But when you enter fights with wild fairies and other fairy trainers it transforms into a somewhat awkward but very playable quake style battle.

All in all its definitely worth getting at this price, especially if you used to love it as much as I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055577774', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1678306167}
review:
Kenne das Spiel noch von früher, leider ging mir damals mein Datenträger flöten so dass ich nun bestimmt seit 2008 auf ein Re-Release gewartet hab und endlich ist es da! 

Zum Spiel ist zu sagen dass es für damalige Maßstäbe fantastisch aussah, und heute zumindest noch Ansehnlich ist. 
Das Spiel besteht aus zwei wesentlichen Teilen, dem erkunden der Welt in der 3rd Person perspektive, hier wird die Geschichte erzählt, man Trifft auf Elfen, Zwerge und Goblins in einer Wunderbar bunten Fantasywelt. 

Die Kämpfe finden in der Egoperspektive statt und spielen sich flott und dynamisch, einzig dass es etwas wenig Arenen gibt ist zu bemängeln stört mich persönlich aber nicht wirklich. 

Die Kämpfe kann man ein Wenig mit Pokemon vergleichen, jede fee hat einen Typ der gegen einen anderen Typ effektiv ist oder eben nicht, Bei einem bestimmten Level entwickeln sich die Feen weiter. Wilde Feen können gefangen werden. Teilweise können Feen auch getauscht werden.

Story geht voll klar, hier will ich nichts verraten aber es lohnt sich sie zu spielen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971190695', 'num_games_owned': 1377, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1510651887}
review:
Have you ever imagined a cross between Quake and Pokémon? I bet not. And you  probably also never heard of ZanZarah, an obscure German game about a teenage girl visiting a land of fairies. What these things have in common? Well, everything.

In ZanZarah you play as Amy, who goes from London to a magical land of fairies, elves and wonder. This enchanted world is threatened by an ancient evil, your arrival was foretold by a prophecy and all that. Your quest here is to explore the land, help the locals and raise a strong party of fairies to save the world. To recruit new magical creatures, you must first weaken one in combat and then capture it with a special ball. Sounds very familiar, no? 

And it doesn’t stop there. ZanZarah offers over 70 magical creatures – including animals, dragons and demons – spread into 12 types: Fire, Water, Nature, Air, Stone, Ice, Chaos, Energy, Psi, Metal, Dark and Light. 

Their attacks have the classic effective/noneffective relationships, and in true Pokémon fashion you also get to choose your initial fairy between three types. They even evolve after reaching a certain level.

But here’s the big twist: unlike Pokémon, you won’t battle in turn-based combat, but rather in FPS arenas with elaborate layouts, firing magic blasts at enemies while strafing, dodging and flying!

There are no guns, but each fairy can equip up to four different spells – two offensive and two passive. The game features 120 spells with a wide range of effects, damage, fire rate and mana pool. Spells must be charged before firing – some allow for quick bursts, others are very slow – but charge too much and it will backfire. All of this keeps battles interesting, as you’ll have to figure out the best loadout to use depending on the arena layout or the enemy type you face.

To crown everything, the soundtrack is excellent. Composed by King Einstein, the battle music is exciting, the exploration music is charming and the main theme is a beautiful melody sang by Karina Gretere.

The only real downside - and this will be a deal breaker for some - is that even this new 2015 Steam re-release doesn't run well on modern computers. You'll occasionally get some visual glithces and graphic artifacts, but the worst part is that the game drops to like 5fps when you open a menu, no matter how powerful your PC is.

If you can deal with this, give ZanZarah a try. If not, don't even bother.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013865593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1440177636}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022705406', 'num_games_owned': 1140, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1576264946}
review: Игра знакомая с детства, что тогда что сейчас захватывает с первых минут игры. Проходил её раз 5, но все равно тянет еще поиграть и пройти ее в очередной раз. Интересная система боя, множество фей которые нужно подбирать для каждого боя вместе с заклинаниями. Потрясающая музыка.  Интересный сюжет. Ставлю 10/10. Огромное спасибо что добавили!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198094009055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1440183993}

Maybe the only negative would be the gameplay that I found a bit slow (moves/animations), but it's definitely not annoying so, good job!

author: {'steamid': '76561198136714625', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1658429945}
review:
Случайно наткнулась на эту игру еще в детстве. Увидев как-то раз у подруги, как она сражается белым мишкой, сразу же купила себе на карманные деньги диск. Тогда она мне показалась сложной, но все-таки я прошла ее несколько раз. 
Zanzarah: The Hidden Portal - отличная игра. Красочная, интересная, увлекательная. Да, есть небольшие проблемы (пара багов, текстурки), но даже они не портят впечатление об игре. Ставлю ей 12 феечек из 10. Спасибо, что добавили наконец-таки в Стим еще один кусочек моего детства.
